channel.title: How do you change the direction of an object?
channel.description: how do you change the direction the object is facing? I'm trying to make a little theifing/stall area, but I need to know how to turn the stalls to make a rectangle with them all still facing the middle :)

item.title: How do you change the direction of an object?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

It’s not the 10, it’s the number before it.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the direction of an object?

item.title: How do you change the direction of an object?
item.dc:creator: @Miss_Doctor Miss_Doctor
item.description:
@Miss_Doctor wrote:

Um, when I changed the 10 to one of those numbers I wasnt able to log in without it loging me back out before it loaded. Also…there’s another number besides those you listed, and it was a 0. o_O I was supposed to change the 0, not the 10. But thanks anyway

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the direction of an object?

item.title: How do you change the direction of an object?
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

In the void newObjects(or whatever you named it), there’s the id, the coords of the object, and then either 10, or the direction. 0, -1, -2, or -3. Change it around untill happy.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the direction of an object?
